This may look like a typical classroom:...
...a room full of desks, students listening and taking notes...
But I assure you, this class is anything but typical.
This is the BYU Beginning Scuba Diving class.
The class is made possible through Dive Utah.
It's a combination of a classroom environment, where the students learn...
...where the students go down under at the Provo Recreation Center...
...and put into practice what they just learned.
The good news about being scuba-certified?
Once you get it, you're certified for life.
